subject: Re: New product added - needs syncing
preview: Hi Yads,  Thank you for letting me know  I’ve checked on C-Tetra Advanced, and it’s still in the process of syncing at the moment. Once the sync fully completes, it should pop through and appear o

full_threads.body:
Hi Yads,

Thank you for letting me know

I’ve checked on C-Tetra Advanced, and it’s still in the process of syncing at the moment. Once the sync fully completes, it should pop through and appear on the site as expected.

We’ll keep an eye on it from our end and let you know as soon as it’s fully through. If it doesn’t show shortly, we’ll jump straight back in to investigate further.

Thanks again for your patience

There is still one more product that isn't syncing

https://yadscauchi.com/c-tetra-advanced/

Could we try again please?

Thank you,

Yads

I have created a reminder to remind me on yads

(Time: 20mins)

Hi Yads,

Thank you so much for confirming, the syncing is now in progress

I'll let you know once the syncing is done 🙏

Hi Yads,

Thanks so much for your patience

Just a quick update, the plugin support team has replied on their end. We have updated the plugins and hopefully it should work.

Could you please try reconnecting the store now and see if it goes through?

Just let me know, happy to help

If it doesn't, I'll let them know

Hi Yads,

Thanks so much for looping everyone in

Just a quick update from our end:
  • A new plugin patch was released, and we’ve already applied the update
    Could you please try reconnecting again:
    • First using the www version of the URL
    • Then without the www, if needed
  • If it still doesn’t reconnect, no stress at all, just let us know
  • Our next step would be to wait for the reply from the  plugin support team so they can assist directly from their side

We’re keeping a close eye on this and are more than happy to help get everything sorted as quickly as possible, especially during such a busy period

Hi team,

Just looping you in on the website issues and our email trail x

Hi Yads,

Perfect, we’ve added the license key on our end.
https://meet.google.com/dcm-heba-wca

Let’s try reconnecting it now. I’m jumping back on the call with you so we can run through it together.

Hi Yads,

Thanks for the update, happy to help you sort this out asap.

If you’d like, we can jump on a quick Google Meet so I can walk you through the reconnection step-by-step and get everything syncing again.

Here’s the link:
https://meet.google.com/dcm-heba-wca

What time works best for you today? I’ll adjust to your availability so we can get this resolved quickly, especially with it being such a busy time.

Happy to assist 💛
Is there a number I can call so I can get this sorted out asap? It's the busiest time of year
So i disconnected and now I can't reconnect

Hi Yads,

Yes,  it’s showing as connected, we’ll just need to disconnect and reconnect it so it refreshes the connection after the recent update.

Once you’ve reconnected the integration, the new product should sync through correctly.

Always happy to help
It says it's connected from my end in shopify?

Hi Yads,

Thank you so much for letting us know.

The website is all good on our end, but it looks like a recent plugin update caused the sync issue.

As we don’t have access to your Shopify account, when you have a moment, could you please reconnect your shop from your side? Once it’s reconnected, the new product should sync through correctly.

Let us know once done and we’ll double-check everything from our side.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena
